value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
value.excerpt: To build a robust BI system, you need to cater for errors and handle errors carefully. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, Iâ€™ll show you a way to catch potential errors
